metadata.name: Suspicious Group And Account Reconnaissance Activity Using Net.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using Net.EXE Check if the user that executed the commands is suspicious (e.g. service accounts, LOCAL_SYSTEM)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\net.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\net1.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('net\\.exe', 'net1\\.exe')) AND ((contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' group ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' localgroup '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('domain admins')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' administrator')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' administrateur')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enterprise admins')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('exchange trusted subsystem')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('remote desktop users')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('utilisateurs du bureau à distance')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usuarios de escritorio remoto')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /do'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /add')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' accounts ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /do'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using Net.EXE Check if the user that executed the commands is suspicious (e.g. service accounts, LOCAL_SYSTEM)

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Inventory tool runs 2. Administrative activity References: https://redcanary.com/blog/how-one-hospital-thwarted-a-ryuk-ransomware-outbreak/, https://thedfirreport.com/2020/10/18/ryuk-in-5-hours/, https://research.nccgroup.com/2022/08/19/back-in-black-unlocking-a-lockbit-3-0-ransomware-attack/
